question: What is the name of the application launched to provide information to sportspersons, about prohibited substances?
explanation:
Union Sports Minister Kiren Rijiju has unveiled National Anti-Doping Agencyâ€™s first mobile application to provide information about prohibited substances and their use.
This application is expected to provide easily accessible information of NADA, so that the athletes and their coaches would remain cautious about the prohibited drugs and medicines. The app also provides means for easy process of conducting a dope test.
